sentences.english: USS New Jersey BB-62 after the 1968 modernization.
sentences.chinese: 1968年经过现代化改装后的新泽西号战列舰。

sentences.english: If asked that who is" marine A male ", I divination battleship not is.
sentences.chinese: 若问谁是”海上A雄“，I卜战列舰莫属。

sentences.english: Light ship-of-the-line has around fifty heavy cannons on two decks.
sentences.chinese: 轻型战列舰在两层甲板上有大约50门中型加农炮。

sentences.english: How fast could the Iowa class battleships really go?
sentences.chinese: 衣阿华级战列舰究竟能跑多快？

sentences.english: Ship of the Lines were the quintessential battleship of the era.
sentences.chinese: 重型战列舰是巨舰时代的精粹之作。

sentences.english: The new battle-ships will be armed with 16-inch guns.
sentences.chinese: 这种新战列舰将装上16英寸口径的大炮。

sentences.english: The range was quite close and my BBs hit the German ships again and again.
sentences.chinese: 双方距离非常的接近我的战列舰一次一次地击中德舰。

sentences.english: The Royal Navy battleship HMS Barham was sunk by German U-boats.
sentences.chinese: 英国皇家海军战列舰“巴勒姆号”被德国潜艇击沉。

sentences.english: Later air reconnaissance showed that the battleship was heavily damaged.
sentences.chinese: 事后，空中侦察表明，该战列舰受伤颇重。

sentences.english: Kure was the home base of the largest battleship ever built, the Yamato .
sentences.chinese: 吴是至今人类建造过的最大战列舰“大和号”的母港。

sentences.english: Cruiser sized modules will no longer drop in Serpentis battleship wrecks.
sentences.chinese: 天蛇战列舰不会掉落巡洋级装备了。
